incidents.name: [RBX3][Dedicated Servers] - Multiple racks incident notification.
incidents.message: We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our offer on the specific racks : 46J21,46G09,46G04,46G05,46G06,46G03,46G02,46F17,46F19,46F22,46F18,46F21,46F20,46F23,46F28,46F27,46F24,46F25,46F31,46E01,46F26,46E20,46E26,46J22,46F29,46F30,46E19,46E18,46E17,46E22,46E21,46E25, 46E24,46E23,46E28,46E27,46E29,46F12,46E30,46E31,46F10,46H11,46G12,46G11,46H13,46G10,46G08,46M09,46M01,46M02,46M03,46M07,46M08,46M04,46M05,46H12,46M06,46G07,46H30,46H29,46G17,46G18,46H31,46G19,46G22,46G20,46H26,46G25 46G24,46G23,46G27,46G26,INT135,46G29,46G28,46G31,46G01.46G21,46I08,46I20,46I25,46I23,46I24,46I26,46I06,46I28,46I27,46I31,46I29,46I30,46I05,46J14,46I04,46H17,46I01,46I03,46J12,46J13,46J06 Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 16/09/2025 14:00 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in these specific racks are temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Some customers may not be able to use their servers in these specific racks. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
